localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
The Russell 2000 is down ~4% today. 

This is why stocks are risky and should be avoided at all costs.
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
罗素2000指数今天下跌了约4%。

这就是为什么股票有风险，应该不惜一切代价避免的原因。

羅素2000指數今天下跌了約4%。

這就是爲什麼股票有風險，應該不惜一切代價避免的原因。
